qas.question: What film studio was brought back in May 2015?
What division of NBCUniversal revived Gramercy Pictures?
What genre of films will Gramercy be responsible for creating?
What year did NBCUniversal take over Sprout?

plausible_answers.text: Gramercy Pictures was revived by Focus Features

context: In June <b3_0>2014<b3_0/>, Universal Partnerships took over licensing consumer products for NBC and Sprout with expectation that all licensing would eventually be centralized within NBCUniversal. In May 2015, <a0_0><b4_0><b5_0>Gramercy Pictures<b4_0/><a0_0/> was revived by <a1_0>Focus Features<b5_0/><a1_0/> as a genre label, that concentrated on <a2_0>action, sci-fi, and horror<a2_0/> films.
